Class ncsa.hdf.h4toh5lib.h4toh5 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----ncsa.hdf.h4toh5lib.h4toh5
public class h4toh5
extends java.lang.Object

H425_ALLATTRS
copy all attributes of an HDF4 object
H425_ALLMEMBERS
copy all members of a Vgroup (except groups)
H425_CLOBBER
CREATE, overwrite if exists
H425_CREATE
CREATE if not exists
H425_DIMSCALE
copy all dimension scales of an HDF4 SDS
H425_NOATTRS
do not copy attributes of an HDF4 object
H425_NODIMSCALE
do not copy dimension scales of an HDF4 SDS
H425_NOMEMBERS
do not copy members of a Vgroup
H425_NOPAL
do not copy palette of an HDF4 GR image
H425_NOREF
do not attach palette to an HDF5 image
H425_OPEN
OPEN if exists
H425_PAL
copy the palette of an HDF4 GR image
H425_REF
attach palette to an HDF5 image

h4toh5()

H4toh5open
public static int H4toh5open(java.lang.String hdf4file,
                             java.lang.String hdf5file,
                             int access) throws H45Exception
          Initialize the h4 to h5 library. The return value is the h4toh5id that must be passed to subsequent library calls.
Parameters:
hdf4file - (IN) The HDF4 file (input). The files is open to read.
hdf5file - (IN) The HDF5 file (input). If the file does not
access - (IN) (input). Controls the overwrite of the output file.
    H425_CREATE
    Create the file if it does not exist, fail otherwise.
    H425_OPEN
    Create the file if it does exist, fail otherwise.
    H425_CLOBBER
    Create the file. If it does exist, delete and create a new file.
Returns:
The h45id, used in subsequent calls.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5openid
public static int H4toh5openid(java.lang.String hdf4file,
                               int h5fid) throws H45Exception
          Initialize the h4 to h5 library. The return value is the h4toh5id that must be passed to subsequent library calls.
Parameters:
hdf4file - (IN) The HDF4 file (input). The files is open to read.
h5fid - (IN) The HDF5 descriptor for an open HDF5 file. (input).
Returns:
The h45id, used in subsequent calls.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5close
public static void H4toh5close(int h45id) throws H45Exception
          Terminate access and free resources of the h4 to h5 library for the session identified by h45id.

the program should close all HDDF4 and HDF5 before calling this.

Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id returned from H4toh5open.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5basvgroup
public static void H4toh5basvgroup(int h45id,
                                   int vgid,
                                   java.lang.String parent,
                                   java.lang.String group,
                                   int vg_flag,
                                   int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vgroup from HDF4 to a group in HDF5, optionally converting members of the vgroup that are not vgroups.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted group should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
vg_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the members
    H425_NOMEMBERS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLMEMBERS
    convert all elements of the Vgroup that are not Vgroups
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vgroup
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the Vgroup into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5advgroup
H4toh5basvgroup
public static void H4toh5basvgroup(int h45id,
                                   int vgid,
                                   java.lang.String parent,
                                   java.lang.String group,
                                   boolean vg_flag,
                                   boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vgroup from HDF4 to a group in HDF5, optionally converting members of the vgroup that are not vgroups.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted group should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
vg_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the members
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all elements of the Vgroup that are not Vgroups
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vgroup
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the Vgroup into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5advgroup
H4toh5advgroup
public static void H4toh5advgroup(int h45id,
                                  int vgid,
                                  java.lang.String parent,
                                  java.lang.String group) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vgroup from HDF4 to a group in HDF5, recursively converting all the members of the vgroup including other vgroups.

Caution: This function should be used carefully, especially when the structure of the HDF4 Vgroup may be complicated.

Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted grup should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5basvgroup
H4toh5vgroupattrname
public static void H4toh5vgroupattrname(int h45id,
                                        int vgid,
                                        java.lang.String parent,
                                        java.lang.String group,
                                        java.lang.String attrname) throws H45Exception
          Convert a named attribute of a vgroup from HDF4 to an attribute of a group in HDF5.

Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted grup should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
attrname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 attribute to copy.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5vgroupattrindex
H4toh5vgroupattrindex
public static void H4toh5vgroupattrindex(int h45id,
                                         int vgid,
                                         java.lang.String parent,
                                         java.lang.String group,
                                         int index) throws H45Exception
          Convert an indexed attribute of a vgroup from HDF4 to an attribute of a group in HDF5.

Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted grup should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
index - (IN) The HDF4 index of the attribute to copy.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5vgroupattrname
H4toh5vdata
public static void H4toh5vdata(int h45id,
                               int vdid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vdata from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vdid - (IN) The vdata ID, returned by HDF4 VSattach.
parent - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group in which to create the dataset.
name - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vdata
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.

                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception

name - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vdata
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.

H4toh5sds
public static void H4toh5sds(int h45id,
                             int sdsid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String dimgroupname,
                             int dim_flag,
                             int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a SDS from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5, with appropriate data type.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdsid - (IN) The SD ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dataset should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
dim_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the dimension scales into HDF5 datasets.
    H425_NODIMSCALE
    don't convert
    H425_ALLDIMSCALE
    convert all dimension scales of the SDS
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the SDS
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the SDS into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5sds
public static void H4toh5sds(int h45id,
                             int sdsid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String dimgroupname,
                             boolean dim_flag,
                             boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a SDS from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5, with appropriate data type.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdsid - (IN) The SD ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dataset should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
dim_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the dimension scales into HDF5 datasets.
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all dimension scales of the SDS
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the SDS
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the SDS into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5sds
H4toh5sdsattrname
public static void H4toh5sdsattrname(int h45id,
                                     int sdsid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String attrname) throws H45Exception
          Convert a named attribute of an SDS from HDF4 to an attribute of a dataset in HDF5.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdsid - (IN) The SD ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dataset is located.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the attribute.
attrname - (IN) The HDF4 attribute.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5sdsattrindex
H4toh5sdsattrindex
public static void H4toh5sdsattrindex(int h45id,
                                      int sdsid,
                                      java.lang.String parent,
                                      java.lang.String dsetname,
                                      int index) throws H45Exception
          Convert a indexed attribute of an SDS from HDF4 to an attribute of a dataset in HDF5.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdsid - (IN) The SD ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dataset is located.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the attribute.
attrname - (IN) The index of the HDF4 attribute.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5sdsattrname
H4toh5image
public static void H4toh5image(int h45id,
                               int riid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String dsetname,
                               java.lang.String palpath,
                               java.lang.String palname,
                               int attr_flag,
                               int pal_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a raster image from HDF4 to an image dataset in HDF5, optionally converting associated palettes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
grid - (IN) The GR image ID, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted image should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to create.
palpath - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the image
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
pal_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the palette of the image
    H425_NOPAL
    don't convert
    H425_PAL
    convert the palette as well as the image
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5pal
H4toh5image
public static void H4toh5image(int h45id,
                               int riid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String dsetname,
                               java.lang.String palpath,
                               java.lang.String palname,
                               boolean attr_flag,
                               boolean pal_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a raster image from HDF4 to an image dataset in HDF5, optionally converting associated palettes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
riid - (IN) The GR image ID, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted image should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to create.
palpath - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the image
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
pal_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the palette of the image
  • false = don't convert the palette
  • true = convert the palette as well as the image
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5pal
H4toh5pal
public static void H4toh5pal(int h45id,
                             int riid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String palgroup,
                             java.lang.String paldset,
                             int attr_flag,
                             int ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a palette from HDF4 to an palette dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
grid - (IN) The GR image ID of an image that refers to the palette, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted palette should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to attach the palette (if none, null).
palgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette
    H425_NOREF
    don't convert
    H425_ALLREF
    attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5image
H4toh5pal
public static void H4toh5pal(int h45id,
                             int riid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String palgroup,
                             java.lang.String paldset,
                             boolean attr_flag,
                             boolean ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a palette from HDF4 to an palette dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
riid - (IN) The GR image ID of an image that refers to the palette, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted palette should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to attach the palette (if none, null).
palgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette to an image
  • 0 = don't attach
  • 1 = attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5image
H4toh5imageattrname
public static void H4toh5imageattrname(int h45id,
                                       int riid,
                                       java.lang.String parent,
                                       java.lang.String dsetname,
                                       java.lang.String attrname) throws H45Exception
          Convert a named attribute of a raster image from HDF4 to an attribute of an image dataset in HDF5.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
grid - (IN) The GR image ID, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the image is found.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset.
attrname - (IN) The attribute to copy.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:

dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset.

H4toh5annoobj_label
public static void H4toh5annoobj_label(int h45id,
                                       java.lang.String parent,
                                       java.lang.String datasetname,
                                       int ref,
                                       int tag,
                                       java.lang.String label,
                                       int label_ind) throws H45Exception
          Convert a object label annotation from HDF4 to a attribute of an object in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the HDF5 object is found.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the annotdaion
ref - (IN) The HDF4 ref for the object the label is attached to,
tag - (IN) The HDF4 tag for the object the label is attached to,
label - (IN) The name of the annotation to convert.
label_ind - (IN) The index of the label.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5obj_alllabels

H4toh5alldimscale
public static void H4toh5alldimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     int attr_flag,
                                     int ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all the dimension scales from an HDF4 SDS to a HDF5 dimension datasets,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group of the dataset to attach.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimensions (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension datasets.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the dimension
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the dimension to the dataset
H425_NOREF
don't convert
H425_ALLREF
attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5onedimscale
H4toh5alldimscale
public static void H4toh5alldimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     boolean attr_flag,
                                     boolean ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all the dimension scales from an HDF4 SDS to a HDF5 dimension datasets,
Parameters:

sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group of the dataset to attach.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimensions (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension datasets.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the dimension
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the dimension to the dataset
  • false = don't attach
  • true = attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.

H4toh5onedimscale
public static void H4toh5onedimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     java.lang.String dimdataset,
                                     int attr_flag,
                                     int ref_flag,
                                     int dim_ind) throws H45Exception
          Convert one dimension scale from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dimension should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimension (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension dataset.
dimdatase - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette to an image
H425_NOREF
don't convert
H425_ALLREF
attach to 'dsetname'.
dim_ind - (IN) The index of the dimension do convert.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:

H4toh5alllonevdata
public static void H4toh5alllonevdata(int h45id,
                                      java.lang.String groupname,
                                      int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all lone vdatas to datasets under a specified HDF5 group, optionally copying the attributes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
groupname - (IN) The HDF5 group in which to place the vdatas.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy attributes:
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the Vgroup into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.

groupname - (IN) The HDF5 group in which to place the vdatas.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy attributes:
  • false don't convert
  • true convert all attributes of the Vgroup into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.

H4toh5alllonesds
public static void H4toh5alllonesds(int h45id,
                                    java.lang.String groupname,
                                    java.lang.String dimgroupname,
                                    int dim_flag,
                                    int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all lone SDSs to datasets under a specified HDF5 group, optionally copying the attributes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
groupname - (IN) The HDF5 group in which to place the vdatas.
dimgroupname - (IN) The HDF5 group to store the dim scales.
dim_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy dimensions:
    H425_NODIMSCALE
    don't convert
    H425_DIMSCALE
    convert all dimensions of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy attributes:
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5alllonesds
public static void H4toh5alllonesds(int h45id,
                                    java.lang.String groupname,
                                    java.lang.String dimgroupname,
                                    boolean dim_flag,
                                    boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all lone SDSs to datasets to a specified HDF5 group, optionally copying the attributes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
groupname - (IN) The HDF5 group in which to place the vdatas.
dimgroupname - (IN) The HDF5 group to store the dim scales.
dim_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy dimensions:
  • true don't convert
  • false convert all dimensions.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy attributes:
  • falsedon't convert
  • trueconvert all attributes of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5allloneimage
public static void H4toh5allloneimage(int h45id,
                                      java.lang.String groupname,
                                      java.lang.String palgroupname,
                                      int attr_flag,
                                      int pal_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all GR images to datasets under a specified HDF5 group, optionally copying the attributes and palettes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
groupname - (IN) The HDF5 group in which to place the vdatas.
palgroupname - (IN) The HDF5 group to store the palette.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy attributes:
    H425_NOATTRS
    don't convert
    H425_ALLATTRS
    convert all attributes of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
pal_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to copy dimensions:
    H425_NOPAL
    don't convert
    H425_PAL
    convert palette.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
